snippet.title: Just Cause 4: Tornado Gameplay Reveal [PEGI]
snippet.description:
https://sqex.link/JCSubscribe

Subscribe to our channel for more content on Just Cause 4! 

In Just Cause 4, gigantic Tornados rip through the destructible world, tear airplanes out of the sky, and send huge pieces of debris spiralling through the air. 

This is not only visually stunning, but they open up unique and brand new gameplay opportunities that just aren’t available in any other video game. Thanks to the new Apex Engine, you’ve never seen anything like this before! 

Just Cause 4 is coming to Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and Windows PC on 4th December 2018.

Be sure to subscribe to our YouTube channel for further updates on Just Cause 4: http://sqex.link/JCSubscribe

https://JustCause.com

Twitch: https://sqex.link/JCTwitch

Instagram: https://sqex.link/JCInstagram
